alchemy.description: Doubles the potency of recovery items.

counter-attack.description: Character strikes back automatically after physical attacks.

darkstrike.description: Adds 100% Darkness to attacks and skills.

darktouch.description: Adds 50% Darkness to attacks and skills.

deathstrike.description: Adds 100% Death to attacks and skills.

deathtouch.description: Adds 50% Death to attacks and skills.

distill ability.description: Adds Distil Ability description to attacks and skills.

distill mana.description: Adds Distil Mana description to attacks and skills.

distill power.description: Adds Distil Power description to attacks and skills.

distill speed.description: Adds Distil Speed description to attacks and skills.

double overdrive.description: Charges Overdrive gauge at double speed.

evade and counter.description: Evade physical attack and strike back automatically.

firestrike.description: Adds Fire element to attacks and skills.

first strike.description: Act first at beginning of battle.

half mp cost.description: Reduces MP cost of spells and skills by half.

icestrike.description: Adds Ice element to attacks and skills.

initiative.description: Raises party's chances for a preemptive strike and eliminates ambushes, except enemys with a 100% ambush rate.

lightningstrike.description: Adds Lightning element to attacks and skills.

magic +3%.description: Increases damage of magical attacks by 3%.

magic +5%.description: Increases damage of magical attacks by 5%.

magic +10%.description: Increases damage of magical attacks by 10%.

magic +20%.description: Increases damage of magical attacks by 20%.

magic booster.description: Increases power of spells by 50%, but doubles their MP cost.

magic counter.description: Strike back automatically after being attacked with magic.

no ap.description: Character will gain no AP at the end of a battle.

one mp cost.description: Reduces MP cost of spells and skills to 1.

overdrive -> ap.description: Converts Overdrive gauge charge into AP.

piercing.description: Attacks and skills ignore enemy's Armoured status.

poisonstrike.description: Adds 100% Poison to attacks and skills.

poisontouch.description: Adds 50% Poison to attacks and skills.

sensor.description: View enemy data and elemental characteristics during battle.

silencestrike.description: Adds 100% Silence to attacks and skills.

silencetouch.description: Adds 50% Silence to attacks and skills.

sleepstrike.description: Adds 100% Sleep to attacks and skills.

sleeptouch.description: Adds 50% Sleep to attacks and skills.

slowstrike.description: Adds 100% Slow to attacks and skills.

slowtouch.description: Adds 50% Slow to attacks and skills.

sos overdrive.description: Charges Overdrive gauge at double speed when HP drops below 50%.

stonestrike.description: Adds 100% Petrification to attacks and skills.

stonetouch.description: Adds 50% Petrification to attacks and skills.

strength +3%.description: Increases damage of physical attacks by 3%.

strength +5%.description: Increases damage of physical attacks by 5%.

strength +10%.description: Increases damage of physical attacks by 10%.

strength +20%.description: Increases damage of physical attacks by 20%.

triple overdrive.description: Charges Overdrive gauge at triple speed.

waterstrike.description: Adds Water element to attacks and skills.

zombiestrike.description: Adds 100% Zombie to attacks and skills.

zombietouch.description: Adds 50% Zombie to attacks and skills.
